sentence.Network_en: Talk things through in stages. Do not accuse or apportion blame.
sentence.Network_cn: 把事情按部就班地讲清楚。不要责难或归罪于人。

sentence.Network_en: I don't wish to apportion blame among you / to any of you.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不愿意怪罪你们大家[你们任何人].

sentence.Network_en: It's already been agreed in principle to apportion the value of the patents.
sentence.Network_cn: 原则上已经同意根据专利的价值按比例来分配.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... portion n 部分，一般 apportion v 分配，分摊 proportion n 比例，成分.
57、runoff 径流。溢流58、apportion 分配59、gauge 量器、表、标准尺寸
摊的组词_百度知道 ... 摊开〖 spreadout;unfold〗 摊派〖 apportion;exaction〗 摊晒〖 ted〗.
词源: portio(L.), part, share 部分apportion v. 分, 分配, 分派pos pon

list.abs: 排定收视 appointment television分配设计 apportion design分配模型 apportion model
分红　distribute dividends; receive dividends份礼　apportioned gift分裂主义　splittism; separatism
at the cost of ... anticipated cost 预期成本 apportioned cost 分派费用, 摊派成本 appraisal cost 鉴定费用.
...applied manufacturing expense 己分配制造费用apportioned charge 摊派费用appreciation 涨价

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Old French apportionner or medieval Latin apportionare, from ad- 'to' + portionare 'divide into portions'

entry.def: When you apportion something such as blame, you decide how much of it different people deserve or should be given.

example.ex: The experts are even-handed in apportioning blame among EU governments...
example.tran: 专家们在明确对欧盟各国政府所应追究的责任时十分公正。

example.ex: The allowable deduction is apportioned between the estate and the beneficiaries.
example.tran: 减免的税额在地产和受益人之间分摊。

means.word_mean: 1. distribute according to a plan or set apart for a special purpose;

sentences.sentence: "I am allocating a loaf of bread to everyone on a daily basis"
"I'm allocating the rations for the camping trip"

means.word_mean: 2. give out as one's portion or share

auth_sentence.content: There is no need to apportion blame to any particular group.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is no need to apportion blame to any particular group.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is no need to apportion blame to any particular group.

auth_sentence.content: While he appeared to apportion blame to other teams' passivity to Manchester United, he needed to look closer to home.
auth_sentence.res_content: While he appeared to apportion blame to other teams' passivity to Manchester United, he needed to look closer to home.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: While he appeared to apportion blame to other teams' passivity to Manchester United, he needed to look closer to home.

auth_sentence.content: With this in mind, we must consider carefully how we apportion responsibility to people who smoke or are overweight.
auth_sentence.res_content: With this in mind, we must consider carefully how we apportion responsibility to people who smoke or are overweight.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: With this in mind, we must consider carefully how we apportion responsibility to people who smoke or are overweight.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportion比例;均衡+al……的→adj.比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重要的, 重大的, 有权力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: import要旨,含意+ant……的→adj.重要的, 重大的, 有权力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+able能……的→adj.轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称

stems_affixes.value_cn: 按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportional比例的+ly表副词→adv.按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
port部分,分开+ion表名词→一部分
pro多+port部分,分开+ion→多个部分,每部分占用一定比例
comport[v.举止,行为]+ment表名词→n.举止
deport[v.驱逐出境]+ation表名词→n.移送,充军,放逐
de加强+port拿,运+ment表名词→一个人所拿[带的]的举止
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义
import传达意义+ance表名词→带有意义的状态→重要性
port拿,运→拿或运东西的地方→港口,舱门
port拿,运+age费用→运费

stems_affixes.value_cn: 守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+er人→n.守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
port拿,运+folio树叶,页→拿树叶,书页的东西→文件夹
pur=per全部+port拿,运→全部拿到一起→要领,意义
s=dis+port传递→原为一种游戏
sport运动+s+man人→n.运动家, 冒险家

stems_affixes.value_cn: 运输;运输系统,运载工具
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输
transport运输,运送+ation表名词→n.运输,运送,客运
dis分开+port拿,运→拿来分心的东西→娱乐
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义

stems_affixes.value_cn: 报告, 传说,报到, 告发
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+port带→把[消息,情况]带回
ap成为+port部分,分开+ion表名词→把整体分成部分→分配

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使不均衡, 使不对称
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称
com共同+port拿,引申为动作→一个人的全部动作
de去掉+port拿,运→拿出去→放逐
sup下面+port带→带来支持
trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输

sentences.en: The federal government apportioned money among the states.
sentences.cn: 联邦政府在各州间分配资金。
